RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFileList

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFileList Class Reference

#include <xmlbonusfilelist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Read a BonusFile XML list.

It is different from the xmlBonusFile. The xmlBonusFile read the BonusFiles and make a list of choice. Here, we make a list of available BonusFile.

It uses TinyXML to deal with the xml file.

Definition at line 39 of file xmlbonusfilelist.cpp.

bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFileList::loadDocument ( CurlFileToXml *  cgf  )  [private]

Loads the xml document or creates it if it does not exist.

It use the CurlFileToXml to get the document. If the document cannot be get this way, we log a warning message and set correctlyLoaded to false.

Parameters:
cgf A pointer to a valid CurlFileToXml instance.
Returns:
true if the xml document was correctly loaded
